content: welcome to week four of the wonderful hats crochet along where we will learn to crochet the cedarwood beanie just like the ainsley beanie crochet pattern last week this crochet hat features a lot of texture this texture resembles a herringbone or an arrowhead design it is created by working some textured mixed cluster stitches which i explain in the pattern and video tutorial a free written copy of this pattern can be found on my ad supported website https //richtexturescrochet com/cedarwood-beanie-crochet-pattern/ a video tutorial for this pattern can be found on my youtube channel https //www yoututbe com/c/richtexturescrochet/ skill level intermediate gauge 17 sts x 16 row of single_crochet = 4 inches finished size 9 x 9 inches laid flat 20-22 inch circumference yarn impeccable by loops & threads ® 100% acrylic 285 yds/260 m 4 5oz/127 5 g 4 medium/worsted weight 1 ball per beanie hook size h/8 5 mm hook adjust hook size if necessary to obtain correct gauge
